item.title: Samsung Releases Critical Update For Most Galaxy Users
item.description: Install this update as soon as you can — even if it makes your phone unusable for a while.

item.title: Amazon Customers Issued 48 Hour Warning—Attacks Have Started
item.description: Look out for these messages on your phone and check your account settings now.

item.title: Why ‘Micro-Joys’ Are The Key To Life-Long Happiness, By A Psychologist
item.description: Small daily pleasures, or micro-joys, do more than lift your mood in the moment. They are, for all intents and purposes, the happiness fuel of your li...

item.title: Microsoft Confirms Windows Password Failure—No Fix Available
item.description: Microsoft users warned that Windows update is “nothing less than a disaster.”
